BarbaraSheridan <bsher213@...> wrote:
 
secretary wrote first:
>>*I am ~aware~ that a certain character portrayed by someone's favorite
>actor will be assasinated this week or next week on NHK Shinsengumi!<<

to which Barb replied:
>>*sniffle, sniffle* It's this week and the stockpiling of Kleenex has already begun.....Please feel free to wear virtual black garments to the chat as a sign of deep mourning *sniffle*<<

Oh, man... does this mean you're going to come on and give away the plot?  <smirk>  And here I was hoping to be surprised when I finally see it.  <bigger smirk>  

(I don't know, Kevin... just how many times *can* you watch Serizawa's assassination?)
(Not that that's what's going to happen on NHK this week... I'm not sure *who* bites the dust... I *do* know, however, who the favorite actor is. :-D)
 
phil (behind on too much NHK gossip, but very happy to have written a full draft of a chapter today!  uh... the historical inaccuracies are just going to have to stay)
